sections.summary:
IT Product Manager bringing 13 years in IT project management. Skilled in installation, configuration, migration and implementation of server
platforms.
Highlights
Enterprise platforms Certified Information Security Manager
Consumer software specialist Self-directed
Project tracking Budgeting and resource management
Hardware and software upgrade planning End-to-end product lifecycles
Product requirements documentation Collaborative
Accomplishments
Reduced the incidence of IT issues by 95% globally by leading a testing initiative improvement program.
